TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit UnauthorizedWebPart extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.ProxyWebPart
Public NotInheritable Class UnauthorizedWebPart Inherits ProxyWebPart

summary.span: 在每次 控件的 方法对 控件返回 时，用于创建一个占位符对象。

span.span: Used to create a placeholder object whenever the control's method returns for a control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Web 部件控件集提供了一种授权机制, 用于确定是否可以将单个控件添加到页中。The Web Parts control set provides an authorization mechanism for determining whether individual controls can be added to a page. 开发人员可以选择为 控件上的属性分配任意字符串。Developers can optionally assign an arbitrary string to the property on a control. 当控件将控件添加到页面时, 它会对照开发人员设置的条件检查此筛选器值, 方法是使用方法, 并在控件未获得授权时返回。 `false` When the control is adding controls to a page, it checks this filter value against criteria set by the developer, by using the method, and returns `false` if a control is not authorized. > [!NOTE] > 此机制还适用于位于区域中的服务器控件和用户控件, 因为这些控件在运行时使用对象进行包装, 并且此对象继承属性。This mechanism also works with server controls and user controls that are placed in zones, because these controls are wrapped with a object at run time, and this object inherits the property. 当控件未获得授权时 , 控件将控件插入页的控件树中, 代替未经授权的控件。 When a control is not authorized, the control inserts an control into the control tree of the page in place of the unauthorized control. 控件树中的 控件保留了未授权控件在页面中的位置,并阻止了用户以前应用于控件的任何个性化设置数据丢失。An control in the control tree reserves the position of the unauthorized control in the page, and prevents any personalization data that a user might have previously applied to the control from being lost. 控件永远不会显示在插入它的页面上, 也不会显示在呈现的页面的源代码中。The control is never displayed on a page in which it is inserted, nor does it appear in the source code for the rendered page. 开发人员可以通过检查 控件的属性来验证其是否存在于页面控件树中。Developers can verify its presence in the page control tree by checking the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件。The following code example demonstrates the use of the control. 此代码示例的第一部分是一个自定义控件, 它重写方法以创建自定义授权条件。The first part of the code example is a custom control that overrides the method to create custom authorization criteria. 将对其属性设置为特定值的任何控件或没有分配给该属性的值的任何控件, 将获得授权, 并且不满足这些条件的控件将不会获得授权。Any control that has its property set to a specific value, or any control that has no value assigned to the property, will be authorized, and controls not meeting these criteria will not be authorized. [!code-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/MyManagerAuthorize.cs#2)] [!code-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/MyManagerAuthorize.vb#2)] 此代码示例的第二部分是承载自定义控件的网页。The second part of the code example is the Web page that hosts the custom control. 在``元素中声明了三个静态服务器控件。There are three static server controls declared within the `` element. 尽管这些控件实际上不是控件, 但它们会在运行时使用对象进行包装, 因此你可以将它们视为控件, 从而为其属性赋值。Although these controls are not actually controls, they will be wrapped with a object at run time, so you can treat them as controls and thus assign values to their properties. 请注意, 控件的筛选器设置为应该根据自定义控件中的条件, 使其能够获得授权的值。Notice that the control has its filter set to the value that should enable it to be authorized, according to the criteria in the custom control. 控件具有一个筛选器值, 该值应导致其不被授权。The control has a filter value that should cause it not to be authorized. 控件不将值分配给属性, 因此默认情况下应对其进行授权。The control does not assign a value to the property, so by default it should be authorized. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/CS/IsAuthorizedCS.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_UnauthorizedWebPart_Overview/VB/IsAuthorizedVB.aspx#1)] 此代码示例的第三部分是必须添加到 Web.config 文件中的设置, 以启用导出 Web 部件说明文件。The third part of the code example is a setting you must add in the Web.config file to enable exporting Web Parts description files. 确保在此代码示例的网页所在的同一目录中有一个 web.config 文件。Ensure that you have a Web.config file in the same directory as the Web page for this code example. 在部分中, 请确保有一个``元素的`enableExport`属性设置为`true`, 如以下标记所示。 ``Within the `` section, make sure there is a `` element with an `enableExport` attribute set to `true`, as in the following markup. `` `...` `` 在浏览器中加载页面, 并注意和控件按预期方式呈现, 但不会呈现控件, 因为它未获得授权。Load the page in a browser, and notice that the and controls are rendered as expected, but the control is not rendered because it was not authorized. 单击 "**列表" web 部件控件**按钮会使控件列出其集合中所有控件的 id。Clicking the **List WebPart Controls** button causes the control to list the IDs of all controls in its collection. 请注意, 将列出控件的 ID, 并证明控件已添加到页面控件树中以容纳其位置, 即使未在页中呈现标签也是如此。Note that the ID for the control is listed, proving that an control was added to the page control tree to hold its place, even though the label is not rendered in the page.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例的属性数据。

span.span: Initializes property data for a new instance of an control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数在它的两个重载中都调用类中的基构造函数。 The constructor, in both of its overloads, calls base constructors in the class. 这些构造函数每个初始化属性数据并创建控件的新实例。These constructors each initialize property data and create a new instance of an control. 当控件将控件 ( 以及其他服务器控件或用户控件) 添加到控件的集合中时, 它会使用方法检查每个控件。 When the control is adding controls (and other server or user controls) to its collection of controls, it checks each control using the method. 如果控制实例未获得授权, 则会将控件中的某些属性值 (如其 ID) 分配给新控件中的属性, 然后将控件添加到页面的控件树中, 以代替失败的控件授权.If a control instance is not authorized, certain property values from the control (such as its ID) are assigned to properties in a new control, and the control is then added to the control tree of the page in place of the control that failed authorization. 控件永远不会呈现在页面中, 并且用户无法知道是否存在。An control is never rendered in a page, and a user has no way of knowing it is there. 不过, 控件也充当占位符, 维护原始控件在控件树中的位置, 并维护原始控件的任何预先存在的个性化设置数据。However, an control also acts as a placeholder, maintaining the position of the original control in the control tree, and maintaining any preexisting personalization data for the original control. 这样一来, 如果用户以前对控件进行了个性化设置, 则它会因为某些原因而成为未经授权的, 稍后会再次获得授权, 用户的个性化设置数据可以还原。That way, if a user previously personalized a control, it then becomes unauthorized for some reason, and later it is authorized again, the user's personalization data can be restored.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.WebPart webPart) cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: A that has failed to be authorized by the control.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例，在某个静态 控件（或者服务器控件或用户控件）授权失败时调用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a static control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 构造函数采用静态控件`webPart`作为参数, 其中`webPart`未通过授权检查。 The constructor takes a static control `webPart` as a parameter, where `webPart` has failed an authorization check. 静态控件是在网页的标记中声明的控件, 而不是以编程方式添加的控件。A static control is one that is declared in the markup of a Web page, rather than being added programmatically. 构造函数返回控件的一个新实例, 该实例将添加到页的控件树中来`webPart`代替。The constructor returns a new instance of an control, which is added to the page's control tree in place of `webPart`. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .

MemberSignature.Value: public UnauthorizedWebPart (string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID);
.method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string originalID, string originalTypeName, string originalPath, string genericWebPartID) cil managed
Public Sub New (originalID As String, originalTypeName As String, originalPath As String, genericWebPartID As String)
public: UnauthorizedWebPart(System::String ^ originalID, System::String ^ originalTypeName, System::String ^ originalPath, System::String ^ genericWebPartID);

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

param.name: originalID
param.span: 包含原始服务器控件或原始用户控件的 ID 的字符串，这类控件被添加到 中，成为了 Web 部件应用程序的一部分。

span.span: A string that contains the ID of the original server or user control that was added to a to participate in a Web Parts application.

param.name: originalTypeName
param.span: 一个字符串，包含原始控件的类型的名称。

span.span: A string containing the name of the original control's type.

param.name: originalPath
param.span: 一个字符串，包含用户控件（如果原始控件是用户控件）的相对虚拟路径。

span.span: A string containing the relative virtual path to the user control, if the original control is a user control.

param.name: genericWebPartID
param.span: 包含 控件的 ID 的字符串，该控件包装原始服务器控件或原始用户控件。

span.span: A string containing the ID of the control that wraps the original server or user control.

summary.span: 初始化 控件的新实例，在某个动态 控件（或者服务器控件或用户控件）授权失败时调用。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of an control, called when a dynamic control (or server or user control) fails authorization.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 当 动态或其他服务器控件未能通过其授权检查时, 将调用构造函数。The constructor is called when a dynamic or other server control fails its authorization check. 动态控件是以编程方式添加到页面的控件, 也可以是由 Web 部件控件目录中的用户添加的控件。A dynamic control is one that is added to a page programmatically, or by a user from a catalog of Web Parts controls. 构造函数返回控件的一个新实例, 用来替换授权失败的动态控件。 The constructor returns a new instance of an control to replace the dynamic control that failed authorization. 有关详细信息，请参阅 。For more information, see .
